name: QuickTime Extension
summary: Learn about .QTX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Early versions of QuickTime for Windows store QTX files in "C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTComponents." QuickTime 7 for Windows stores QTX files in the "C:\Windows\system32\" directory.
In Mac OS X, QTX files are stored in the "/Library/Quicktime/" folder.

description: Component used by Apple QuickTime Player; enables support for additional video codecs and file formats; allows QuickTime to play video files encoded with third-party codecs; must be installed in the correct folder in order to be recognized by QuickTime.
